fields.name: Subheadline
fields.default: Find answers to common questions about our product and services.

default.question: Do I need a credit card to start the free trial?
default.answer: No, you can start your 14-day free trial without entering any payment information. We'll only ask for payment details when you decide to upgrade.

default.question: Can my whole team use the same inbox?
default.answer: Yes! Oatmeal is built for team collaboration. You can invite unlimited team members on any plan, and everyone can access the shared inbox.

default.question: What integrations do you support?
default.answer: We integrate with Slack, Zapier, Gmail, Outlook, and many more. Check our integrations page for the full list.

default.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
default.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No questions asked.
